pdpa.title: Personal Data Protection Policy (PDPA)
pdpa.subtitle: Please read and confirm your consent before using the booking system.
pdpa.consentLabel: I have read and agreed to the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data according to this notice.

purpose.title: Purpose of collecting personal data
paragraphs: We collect data to verify identity, provide services, and improve the user experience.
bullets: Compliance with applicable laws and regulations

sensitive.title: Sensitive data and consent
paragraphs: If sensitive data is required, we will request additional consent and use it in a limited manner.

disclosure.title: Disclosure to third parties
paragraphs: Data will be disclosed only as necessary to provide services or when consent is provided.
bullets: Regulatory authorities as required by law

rights.title: Data subject rights
paragraphs: You can access, update, withdraw consent, or request deletion of your data.

PDPA_ACCEPT_TEXT: I have read and understood the terms regarding the collection and disclosure of personal data, and I consent to the use of my data as described above.
PDPA_TC_1_P1: Users agree to use our ticket booking system for lawful purposes only and shall not engage in any actions that violate others’ rights or cause damage to the system.
PDPA_TC_2_L1: A booking is considered complete when the user provides all required information and successfully completes payment.
PDPA_TC_2_L2: The system will send the booking reference and details via LINE or email within 5 minutes after payment confirmation.
PDPA_TC_2_L3: If you do not receive confirmation, please contact our support team within 24 hours.
PDPA_TC_3_L1: Cancellations and refund requests are subject to the airline’s or the original provider’s policies.
PDPA_TC_3_L2: If a refund is permitted, fees may be deducted as stated in the booking details.
PDPA_TC_3_L3: Some ticket types or services may be non-refundable.
PDPA_TC_4_L1: Users consent to our collection and use of personal data such as name, phone number, and email for contact and service purposes.
PDPA_TC_4_L2: Data will be securely stored and will not be disclosed to third parties without authorization.
PDPA_TC_4_L3: Read the full policy at the Privacy Policy page.
PDPA_TC_5_P1: We reserve the right to change these terms without prior notice. The latest terms will be displayed on the website or the LIFF page.
